Deinit the AVRC controller and stop listening for incoming connections

Disconnect from the peer AVRC target device After disconnection , start listening for incoming connections

briefdescription.para: API To get LRAC Switch data.

detaileddescription.para: Called by the application to get the LRAC Switch Data This api is supported only (in Embedded mode) when app and profile are running on an Infineon BT chip such as 20721.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a buffer which will be filled with LRAC Switch data (current A2DP Sink State)
Size of the buffer (IN), size filled (OUT)

briefdescription.para: API To set LRAC Switch data.

detaileddescription.para: Called by the application to set the LRAC Switch Data This api is supported only (in Embedded mode) when app and profile are running on an Infineon BT chip such as 20721.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a buffer which contains LRAC Switch data (new A2DP Sink State)
